verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician<s%> upon <S%H5058>Neginah,<s%> A Psalm of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> my <S%H7440>cry,<s%> O <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H7181>attend<s%> to my <S%H8605>prayer.<s%>

From the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> will I <S%H7121>cry<s%> to you, when my <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H5848>overwhelmed:<s%> <S%H5148>lead<s%> me to the <S%H6697>rock<s%> that is <S%H7311>higher<s%> than I.
For you have <S%H1961>been<s%> a <S%H4268>shelter<s%> for me, and a <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4026>tower<s%> from the <S%H341>enemy.<s%>
I will <S%H1481>abide<s%> in your <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> for <S%H5769>ever:<s%> I will <S%H2620>trust<s%> in the <S%H5643>covert<s%> of your <S%H3671>wings.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
For you, O <S%H430>God,<s%> have <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H5088>vows:<s%> you have <S%H5414>given<s%> me the <S%H3425>heritage<s%> of those that <S%H3373>fear<s%> your <S%H8034>name.<s%>
You will <S%H3254>prolong<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H3117>life:<s%> <S%H5921><s%> and his <S%H8141>years<s%> as <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
He shall <S%H3427>abide<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> for <S%H5769>ever:<s%> O <S%H4487>prepare<s%> <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and <S%H571>truth,<s%> which may <S%H5341>preserve<s%> him.
<S%H3651>So<s%> will I <S%H2167>sing<s%> praise to your <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H5703>ever,<s%> that I may <S%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H7999>perform<s%> my <S%H5088>vows.<s%>
